name: PLAYBOX_GAZETTE
prompt_base: Hyper-pop candy glow studio with glossy surfaces, neon rimlight and direct flash (saturation boosted 125%). Checkerboard floor with rainbow shimmer, inflatable background shapes, pastel toy crates, sticker-covered speaker in background. No human model â€” product displayed as floating mid-air, spinning slightly, with chain charm trailing like comet tail. 1 hero item (AirPods case) in full front view, translucent glowing.  1 side inset (zoom on charging port).  1 floating sticker sheet in background with product face mascot. Bubble FX scattered in background (opacity 30%).  Cartoon lightning bolt FX behind product for pop.  Mini disco ball and sticker explosion overlay.  Tagline starburst (retro sticker style). Shape: Capsule contour with slightly rounded edges. Material: Soft TPU jelly with UV-reactive gloss. Key Feature: Glow-in-the-dark candy shimmer + clip-on mini mascot charm.
negative_prompt: Minimalist setting, low contrast, neutral colors, natural light, realistic shadows, serious styling, mature tones.
